data.system_settings: Works at different versions of Windows 10
data.client_settings: Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 19623 Can reproduce on Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 19535
data.actual_result: It acts like its still at max/top.
data.expected_result: It should go back to automatic sensitivity and my friends should hear me.
data.short_description: A bug that makes the "Automatically determine input sensitivity" function disfonctuion.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Settings>Voice & Video. - Disable "Automatically determine input sensitivity." - Set the sensitivity slider to top/max. - Enable "Automatically determine input sensitivity." without touching the slider. - Try to talk to your friend / talk at a server.
